item.title: Australian tourists stranded on Socotra Island in Yemen amid UAE and Saudi Arabia tensions
item.description: Despite warnings of armed conflict and terrorism, the island has become a niche tourist destination.

item.title: Former socialite Brynne Edelsten bailed out by mother after serious drug trafficking charges
item.description: Her mother flew thousands of kilometres to secure the glamour girl’s freedom.
